topic.shortdesc: Remove a backup from a backup archive.

section.title: Description
section.p: Use the remove command only when the backup data is no longer needed. The command removes all incremental backups for the specified backup.

section.title: Options
section.p:
The following are the command options:
remove options
Option Description
--dir /[directory name] Name of the backup directory.
--name REPOSITORY-NAME Name of the backup archive.

section.title: Examples
section.p: Run the remove command to remove data from the backup archive travel:./backup remove --dir /tmp/backups --name travel
